page.title: 15THE CAPEL SPECTACULAR
page.content: The first Village Hall was built straight after the Second World War, wood from the Airship Shed (now the Blue Channel Caravan site) was used in its building.A new Village Hall was built in 1980. . This Village Hall is used by many clubs and societies e.g.the visiting library Badminton,Brownies,Guides, Cubs Scouts,the Gardener's Club, Dancing,Youth Club,the Women's Institute and Play Group. There is a committee which runs the Village Hall and regularly holds dances and discos to raise funds for the Hall. Each July the Capel Spectacular is held.This is a week of activities starting with a Fun Run and including a Village Quiz (our teachers put in a team),demonstrations,dances and ending on Saturday with a Grand Fete.All local societies participate.
